scripts.build: rm -rf dist .tsbuildinfo && tsc --preserveWatchOutput && tsc-alias && npm run copy-public && npm run db:generate && npm run db:fix-migrations && npm run db:copy-migrations
scripts.predev: rm -rf dist .tsbuildinfo && npm run db:generate && npm run db:fix-migrations && npm run copy-public
scripts.dev: npm run predev && concurrently -p "[{name}]" -n "ts,db,pub" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npm run watch:ts" "npm run watch:db" "npm run watch:public"
scripts.watch:db: nodemon --watch src/db/schema.ts --exec "npm run db:generate && npm run db:fix-migrations"
scripts.db:copy-migrations: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const src='./src/db/migrations/'; fs.glob(src+'**', (err, matches) => {if (err) throw err; console.log(matches);}); fs.cpSync(src,'./dist/db/migrations/', {recursive: true});"
scripts.copy-public: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const src='./src/public/'; fs.glob(src+'**', (err, matches) => {if (err) throw err; console.log(matches);}); fs.cpSync(src,'./dist/public', {recursive: true});"
